question: I have been experiencing reoccurring cuts on my foreskin for the past 6 months. I've never had a test for diabetes, however I am not remotely overweight ~70kg & 182cm tall. I want to go and get these cuts checked out as they never seem to heal and the foreskin just seems to be staying tight. Also I'd like to get a test for diabetes and penile cancer if possible.Can I get all of this done by the same doctor? Also should I see a urologist or a dermatologist?Thanks!
title: Do I see a dermatologist or a urologist?
